Texts.Chs: 最后，凯尔将军联系了我们。她和她最优秀的士兵一起逃离了地球，他们在离火星不远的一个空间站避难。从那时起，他们就开始计划如何对付这个正在吞噬我们星球的巨大怪物。
Texts.Eng: Finally, General Kale made contact. She escaped Earth with a fleet of her best soldiers, and they've taken refuge in a space station not far from Mars. From there, they're planning and strategising what to do about the giant damn monster that's eating our planet.

Texts.Chs: 当我的上司在通讯线路上和她说话时，我无意中听到了这一切。他问她建议其他人怎么做。“做什么都行,”她说。这将是一条漫长的归家之路。我认为我们短期内不会再次返回地球。
Texts.Eng: I overheard all this as my superior officer spoke to her on the comm-link. He asked her what she suggested the rest of humanity do. 'Do whatever,' she said. 'It's going to be a long road home'. I don't think we're going back to Earth any time soon.
